item.title: Easy Way To Embed Asciinema Into Hugo
item.description: As a blog author, especially those related to computing, sometimes we need a media that can support the content. There are many ways to support content, including screenshots and video recording. but if we are faced with commandline interactive, it doesn’t feel right if we use screenshots or video recording as a means of documentation.

item.title: How to Activate Bluetooth With Just A Terminal on Linux
item.description:
Intro

bluetooth is one of the technologies that must exist in every computer device, because of its many, many uses, not only for file transfers, but bluetooth can also be used to connect sound wirelessly.

Background

item.title: Authenticate Git With SSH
item.description:
Intro

authenticating git with ssh is by generating a pair of encryption keys asymmetrically, where the key is stored on the system and the other is stored on the server.

item.title: Emptty: A Very Simple Display Manager
item.description:
description

emptty itself is cli based, this is what makes it quite simple to operate, emptty is a simple display manager, emptty is written in the go language. but there are some configurations that we must determine first, so that emptty can work as we want.
